item.title: WhatsApp is making it easier to identify and leave suspicious group chats
item.description:
Soon, when WhatsApp users are added to group chats by someone they don’t know, the group will display a “context card” with key information such as who created the group, when it was created, the group description, and if the user was added by someone in their WhatsApp contact list. The idea of the feature is to better protect users against spam or scam activity in group messages.

There’s also a button to allow users to quickly leave the group message, plus a link to additional information about WhatsApp’s safety tools.

The new feature — which resembles the current experience when WhatsApp users are...

Continue reading…
item.dc:creator: Jess Weatherbed

item.title: TechCrunch Minute: This is what happens when you shoot down a delivery drone
item.description:
Florida man is back with a vengeance, and this time, he’s going after Walmart delivery drones.  Yes, really. Walmart was demonstrating its delivery drone technology in Clermont, Florida – about twenty-five miles outside of Orlando – and a man allegedly shot the drone out of the sky when it flew near his house. Nice: You can buy AirPods for $69 — and that's not a typo
item.description: As of July 9, get a pair of Apple AirPods (2nd gen) at Amazon for just $69 ahead of the upcoming Prime Day sales event.

item.title: Sonny Angel and Casetify are releasing a heavenly phone case collab
item.description: Sonny Angels will grace phone cases in a new collection from Casetify. Here's how to preorder.

item.title: 10+ self-emptying robot vacuums on sale the week before Prime Day
item.description: Prime Day officially starts on July 16, but Amazon is already offering 50% off the Shark AI Ultra, Eufy X9 Pro, and Narwal Freo.

item.title: Pre-Prime Day Roomba deals are finally trickling in
item.description: More Roombas should go on sale before Prime Day starts on July 16, but for now, snag the Roomba Combo i3+ for almost 50% off.

item.title: You should probably wait to get a Fire Tablet until Prime Day starts, but there are a few on sale ahead of the big event
item.description: As of July 5, a few of Amazon's Fire Tablets are on sale ahead of Prime Day, although we think the deals will be much better when the event officially starts. Here are the best deals so far, including up to $95 off the Fire HD 10.

item.title: Prime Day Chromebook deals are already going strong — check out our top picks
item.description: As of July 3, a good amount of Chromebooks from various brands are on sale ahead of Amazon Prime Day. Check out our favorite discounts so far.

item.title: Get the M1 MacBook Air for an all-time low price of $649 at Walmart
item.description: As of July 9, the M1 MacBook Air is down to $649 on Walmart, which is an all-time low price on Apple's affordable MacBook.

item.title: Amazon deal of the day: The brand-new Echo Spot is already on sale for Prime members
item.description: Amazon's best deals of the day on July 9 include the Echo Spot, JBL Tune 230NC earbuds, Sony Bluetooth speaker, Fire Max 11 tablet, and Shark SpeedStyle.
